column4: ok, I've got a confusing one here....the latest updates today are installing grub-pc (1.97~beta4-1ubuntu4)...
and I have a debconf window saying it's configuring grub-pc, and asking me what I want to do about grub....
and honestly, I have no idea what option to select......
i had that updating Xubuntu today and it seemed to me it was best to keep what I have, I know it works
